keyEvents.title: Smiley Fragments Rain Down
keyEvents.description: Massive blobs of Smiley's body rain down across the snowy region of Punk Hazard, creating a deadly toxic threat.
keyEvents.significance: The entire island becomes a battlefield as Caesar's weapon of mass destruction is unleashed.

keyEvents.title: Marine Ship Destroyed
keyEvents.description: A Marine warship on Punk Hazard's frozen lake is destroyed by an exploding Smiley fragment.
keyEvents.significance: First major casualties from Smiley's attack occur on the island.

description: An island in the New World split between fire and ice, formerly a government research facility where Vegapunk conducted experiments. Now occupied by Caesar Clown who uses it for illegal experiments.
notableFeatures: Split into burning and frozen halves
Surrounded by toxic gas from Caesar's previous experiments
Connected by a frozen lake between the two sides

name.japanese: パンクハザード研究所

keyEvents.title: Luffy Declares to Capture Caesar
keyEvents.description: Outside the laboratory, Luffy announces his intention to capture Caesar directly.
keyEvents.significance: Sets up the episode's primary objective.

keyEvents.title: Franky Breaches the Wall
keyEvents.description: Franky uses Radical Beam to blast through the laboratory's reinforced exterior wall.
keyEvents.significance: Creates an entrance for the Straw Hats to infiltrate the facility.

keyEvents.title: Caesar Appears and Explains Smiley
keyEvents.description: Caesar appears at the laboratory and reveals information about his deadly experiment.
keyEvents.significance: Caesar's monologue provides crucial exposition about the arc's threat.

keyEvents.title: Luffy Grabs Caesar
keyEvents.description: Luffy jumps up and grabs Caesar at the laboratory, beginning their confrontation.
keyEvents.significance: Direct confrontation between protagonist and antagonist begins.

description: Caesar Clown's research facility on Punk Hazard where he conducts illegal experiments on children and develops weapons of mass destruction.
notableFeatures: Contains holding cells for kidnapped children
Monitored by Caesar through video surveillance
